transcript:
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Haan, hello. IndiaMART customer care se bol rahe hain.
Customer: Ji, bataiye.
Executive: Ji, mere ko load ke regarding baat karna tha. Meri truck hai aur mere ko Durgapur se load chahiye, Banaras, Allahabad, Kanpur ke liye.
Executive: Sir, kahaan se baat kar rahe hain? Company kaunsi hai aapki?
Customer: Durgapur.
Executive: Company Alatech Traders meri company hai.
Executive: Haan, sir, main Utkarsh baat kar raha hun. Aapne udhar bhi call kar sakte the. Main aapka account manager baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Kahaan se?
Executive: A, ek minute. Alatech Traders se baat kar rahe hain na, sir?
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Samrendra ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan, haan, Samrendra ji.
Executive: Ji, sir, main Utkarsh baat kar raha hun, aapka account manager.
Customer: Achha, achha, Utkarsh ji bol rahe hain. Thik hai, thik hai.
Executive: Ji, ji, ji.
Customer: Haan, yeh mere ko truck yeh load truck load ke regarding baat karni thi. Mere ko Durgapur se load bhejna hai. Aapko Allahabad, Kanpur, Banaras.
Executive: Achha, achha. Rukiye, main aapko call back kar raha hun sir, isi number pe, thik hai?
Customer: Thik, thik.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs load for truck from Durgapur.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back on the same number.



Next Steps: 

None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- load, truck, call back
